website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Alpha 6300 adds weather-sealing and 4K video to the popular midrange Alpha 6000. It's the premium mirrorless camera that Sony photographers have been waiting for.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant camera! Have been using this with the crane stabiliser and footage has been epic!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Brillaint
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera - feature packed, I bought it for the 4K capabilities and was not disappointed. Superb image quality from a tiny package. Ordering from Amazon was seamless, arrived promptly and adequately packed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Spencer-White

customer_reviews.title: My best camera so far
customer_reviews.text: My long awaited upgrade from an A6000. Love this camera and can see myself keeping it for a long while. Pretty much does everything. Paired it up with a Zeiss 16-70 and I don't carry much else now
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy to have SONY A6300 with this amazing price
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy to have SONY A6300 with this amazing price! Big change for me since I used SONY NEX5N for 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: The ease of use and picture quality is brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best camera for the price I have ever owned, the only gripe is you do need a lot of batteries for it. The ease of use and picture quality is brilliant and I dont normally use auto focus but after buying this camera I have found myself using it more and more on every shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, but if you remove lens at all you will need to spend lots on sensor-cleaning stuff!
customer_reviews.author: A. Sharples

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Thiis a fantastic camera and although menus take a little getting used to it wasn`t long before I could navigate quickly. I use with my Sony SELP18105G and find them a great combination. The auto focus is really quick and I have taken some great shots of my dog.It is a really enjoyable camera to use and produces some great results.
customer_reviews.author: Corvo

customer_reviews.title: Pity
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera but the thing is riddled with banding issues indoors with artificial light. I have many other cameras and they do not have this issue. You can see in the viewfinder or on the LCD as the camera focuses the banding happenng - LCD and viewfinder. Silent shutter makes the banding lines thin and often, silent off makes the banding lines wide and fewer. Unacceptable. I see others have a similar issues. I wanted a camera for general purpose not daylight only. This is true of RAW files in Lightroom and Jpegs. Back it goes. Note my a5100 does not have this issue...
customer_reviews.author: D Deacon

customer_reviews.title: shooting 4k its great!
customer_reviews.text: This is now my BCam for shooting weddings, I also used it in a studio shoot today, shooting 4k its great!
customer_reviews.author: Cipiatone

customer_reviews.title: It’s very good but limited apps-c lenses now it’s too late to ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s very good but limited apps-c lenses now it’s too late to move to full frame . No reason to buy APS-C
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend at this price point
customer_reviews.text: Poor battery life. Difficult to use. Complex menue. Expensive lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sony ILCE6300 Compact System Camera Body Only (24.2 MP, APS-C Image Sensor) - Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Body OnlySony ILCE6300 Interchangeable Lens Digital Camera (24.2 MP,APS-C Image Sensor) - Black.

BOX CONTAINS
A6300 Camera Body
AC Adaptor
Power Cord
NPFW50 Rechargeable Battery
Shoulder Strap
Body Cap
Accessory Shoe Cap
Eyepiece Cup
Micro USB Cable
feature_bullets: One of the world's fastest autofocus speed at 0.05 second together with wide coverage with 425-points, High-density Tracking technology keeps tracking fast moving subjects
24.2 MP APS-C image sensor with BIONZ X image processor and high sensitivity up to ISO51,200 with less noise
Internal 4K movie recording at high resolution, thanks to 20 MP oversampling to create 4K image (8 MP)
High contrast and high resolution XGA OLED viewfinder for accurate image confirmation, 120fps display mode helps to keep tracking the fast moving subject
Reliable body construction with magnesium alloy, robust lens mount and dust and moisture resistant design
